Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Insider Risk Management - Data Security Investigation integration
Description:
Launch a pre-scoped Data Security Investigation (DSI) from an IRM case. When a data security admin identifies a risky user who needs deeper investigation, they can launch a pre-scoped investigation directly from an IRM case, allowing them to view content analysis related to that user and better assess post-incident data impact.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025
